row.entry: Type of security meta data observation made about an IT resource (data, information object, service, or system capability), which may be used to make access control decisions. Security meta data are used in security labels. According to ISO/TS 22600-3:2009(E) A.9.1.7 SECURITY LABEL MATCHING, Security label matching compares the initiatorâ„¢s clearance to the target's security label. The readers are encouraged to refer to the source value set definitions for a comprehensive description and explanation of codes.
